p: The aerial parts of O. decumbens populations were collected from Nourabad Mamasani, Kahnoyeh-Lar, Behbahan, and Dehdasht in Iran. The samples of the plants were harvested during the flowering stage in June 2017. The plant samples were identified by Prof. Ahmad Reza Khosravi and deposited at the herbarium of Biology Department, Shiraz University. The voucher specimens and geographical attributes of O. decumbens populations are shown in Table 3.
